text: 20.33 For part 7 of the policy, developers should submit a plan for the management of on-site waste to demonstrate how much construction, demolition and excavation waste will be reused and recycled, taking account of the London Plan target of 95%. The sustainable transportation of waste (by water and rail) will be assessed as part of Policy RW2, see Part 1(i). REUSE, RECYCLING AND WASTE 20.34 All sites and areas of search listed under Policy RW1 are shown on the relevant policies maps for Tower Hamlets and the LLDC.
